Uses of Interface
nzilbb.media.MediaConverter

  • Packages that use MediaConverter 
    Package Description
    nzilbb.media
    Interfaces and classes for automated media processing.
    nzilbb.media.ffmpeg
    Media processing classes that use ffmpeg for editing/converting media.
    nzilbb.media.wav
    Classes for processing WAV files, using the javax.sound.sampled native Java API.

    • Uses of MediaConverter in nzilbb.media

      Subinterfaces of MediaConverter in nzilbb.media 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  IMediaConverter
      Deprecated.
      Use MediaConverter instead.

    • Uses of MediaConverter in nzilbb.media.ffmpeg

      Classes in nzilbb.media.ffmpeg that implement MediaConverter 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  FfmpegConverter
      MediaConverter implemented by executing ffmpeg

    • Uses of MediaConverter in nzilbb.media.wav

      Classes in nzilbb.media.wav that implement MediaConverter 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  FragmentExtractor
      MediaConverter that extracts portions of sound samples using the javax.sound.sampled API, with optional resampling.
      class  Resampler
      MediaConverter that converts sound samples using the javax.sound.sampled API.
